description: Amendment to approved treatment of new top storey on existing two storey side extension on Bride Street & to approved changes to appearance of remainder of extension, including fitting of louvre topped double doors at ground floor level. Changes to internal layouts of approved flats and of commercial unit, including repositioning of refuse storage and disabled WC.
decision_conditions: REASON: The amended treatment of the approved enlarged side extension would make it appear top-heavy, overturning the usual hierarchy by which the apparent storey height diminishes as you read up the elevation. It would also give undue prominence to the top storey. Such an arrangement would be unsympathetic to the appearance of the building and its relationship to the neighbouring terrace and would conflict with the objectives of Policies D4, D11 and D27 of the Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002.
